section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr An-Nahshali narrated from Habib bin Abi Thabit, from Yahya bin Al-Jazzar, that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to pray eight rak'ahs at night and pray witr with three, and pray two rak'ahs before Fajr
